title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Company Description Multixion is a team of innovative craftsmen dedicated to continuous improvement across all aspects of development. We specialize in delivering high-performance digital solutions by pushing the boundaries of modern web technologies, with a strong emphasis on frontend excellence using frameworks like React.js and Next.js. Role Description This is a full-time remote role for a Full Stack Web Developer, reporting to our Saudi Arabia (Eastern Province) branch. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining modern full-stack applications using React.js, Next.js, and backend technologies such as Node.js or Laravel. You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver clean, scalable, and maintainable code. Key Responsibilities * Develop responsive, high-performance web interfaces using React.js and Next.js * Build and integrate RESTful APIs and backend services using Node.js or Laravel * Collaborate with UI/UX designers and backend developers * Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and SEO (especially with SSR in Next.js) * Maintain code quality, perform testing, and participate in code reviews * Ensure security and data protection across web applications Qualifications * 1–3 years of experience in full stack web development * Expertise in React.js and Next.js * Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and Tailwind CSS * Experience with Node.js, Express, or Laravel for backend * Familiarity with Git, cloud hosting (Vercel, Netlify, DigitalOcean), and CI/CD * Strong debugging, problem-solving, and communication skills * Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience Benefits & Compensation 💰 Salary: ₹3,00,000 per annum (INR) 🏡 Remote Work: 100% remote with coordination in GMT+3 timezone (Saudi working hours) 📈 Performance Bonus: Annual bonus based on KPIs and milestones 🚀 Annual Salary Review: Increases based on performance evaluation 📄 Contract: 2-year full-time contract (renewable) 🎓 Learning & Development: Access to paid tools, courses, and mentorship

🧘‍Work-Life Balance: Flexible hours with task-oriented delivery focus

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Job Description:




As an AWS NodeJS Developer (Full Stack), you will play a pivotal role in designing, developing, and maintaining our web applications using NodeJS (backend) and ReactJS (frontend). You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the seamless integration of front-end and back-end components, delivering exceptional user experiences. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in software development, a keen eye for detail, and a passion for keeping up with emerging technologies.




Responsibilities:




 * Collaborate with product managers, UI/UX designers, and fellow developers to design and implement robust software solutions.
 * Participating in daily standup, sprint planning, retrospective meetings during project implementation phase.
 * Develop responsive and user-friendly front-end interfaces using ReactJS, ensuring optimal performance across various devices and browsers.
 * Design and implement RESTful APIs and back-end services using NodeJS to support front-end functionalities.
 * Deploy, manage, and scale containerized applications using Kubernetes clusters in cloud environments, ensuring high availability and resilience.
 * Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment of microservices and front-end applications on AWS infrastructure.
 * Utilize AWS Amplify to accelerate front-end and back-end development, including authentication, API integration, and hosting.
 * Integrate AWS services such as Lambda, RDS, S3, and DynamoDB with applications deployed on Kubernetes and Amplify.
 * Document deployment processes, configurations, and best practices for cloud-native applications.
 * Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to maintain code quality and best practices.
 * Identify and address technical debt, performance bottlenecks, and other development challenges.
 * Work with databases and data models to ensure efficient data storage, retrieval, and manipulation.
 * Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies and propose relevant improvements to the development process.




 * Skills: Proven experience (min 5+ years) as a Full Stack Developer with hands-on expertise in NodeJS and ReactJS.
 * Familiarity with the NodeJS frameworks (e.g. Express, NestJS) and design/architectural patterns (e.g. Microservices, Model-View-Controller (MVC) and Middleware)
 * Strong understanding of web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
 * Experience with front-end state management libraries (e.g., Redux) and front-end build tools (Vite, Webpack, Babel, etc.).
 * Proficiency in designing and consuming RESTful APIs.
 * Hands-on experience with Kubernetes for orchestrating containerized applications in production environments.
 * Proficiency in deploying and managing AWS resources especially EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service)
 * Experience with AWS Amplify for building, deploying, and hosting full-stack applications with built-in authentication, API, and storage solutions.
 * Experience with CI/CD pipelines using tools such as AWS CodePipeline, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins for automated deployments.
 * Solid knowledge of database systems, SQL, and data modeling.
 * Proven experience in creating quality SQL store procedures and scripts
 * Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
 * Excellent understanding of OWASP standards
 * Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
 * Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
 * Experience using IDE tools like Visual Studio.
 * Familiarity with the .NET and .NET Core framework is a plus.

title: Full stack Software Engineer Specialist
description:
Nasdaq Technology is looking for a passionate Full stack Software Engineer Specialist with focus on AWS Cloud SaaS Java and React Development, to join the Mumbai technology center in India. If Innovation and effectiveness drive, you forward this is the place for you!

Nasdaq is continuously revolutionizing markets and undergoing transformations while we adopt new technologies to develop innovative solutions, constantly aiming to rewrite tomorrow. As a Full stack Software Engineer Specialist you will be a member of a cross-functional team, delivering critical data solutions for financial markets around the globe. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work in a strong experienced team delivering complex technology solutions to our external clients. You will work with and learn from subject matter experts and have the opportunity to take on more responsibility and progress within the development team.

We are looking for candidates with a genuine desire and drive to deliver top technology solutions to today's markets

With this position we offer

Join the Marketplace Technology organization, to work on our Nasdaq Eqlipse Intelligence product, a comprehensive platform for democratizing data access, enhancing operational efficiency and generating new revenue streams, enabling Financial Market Infrastructure organizations to unlock the full potential of their data.

Role Responsibilities -

As Full stack Software Engineer Specialist your focus will be developing and implementing software solutions. Besides working closely with your colleagues in Mumbai you will also work closely with Nasdaq teams in other countries.

You will be responsible for the development, implementation, testing, and maintenance of software applications. Be involved in the full software development life cycle, from planning and designing to coding and testing. Work closely with business analysts and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into software solutions. Also be responsible for providing user support and training. Design, develop, test, deploy, and maintain software applications. Serve as technical expert on development projects. Support, maintain and documents software functionality. Participate in software design meetings and performs code reviews.

We expect you to have: (Minimum Qualifications)


 * Java - at least 5 years of experience as a Java software engineer.
 * Web development - JavaScript, React & Single-Page Web application experience.
 * AWS experience.
 * SQL, RESTful APIs, Spring and Spring Boot expertise.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Introduction

Vegayan Systems is a premier provider of advanced networking products and integrated solutions for communication network operators. It provides mission-critical solutions to tier-one telecom operators, CSP and enterprise customers.

At Vegayan, we encourage team members to be creative and pursue their dreams by developing cutting-edge products and delivering key solutions to customers. Our work environment is flexible, diverse, and lively, giving everyone the opportunity to do their best and achieve amazing things. We work closely with our customers including major service providers and top enterprises to keep abreast with new technical advances and requirements.

Come join us and become a part of an Indian hi-tech products company that is leading the way in telecom software and network technologies. Together, let us shape the future of communication networks with Vegayan.

Position: Full Stack Developer (React & Spring)

Location: Mumbai - Vikhroli

Experience: 4+ years

Job Summary

We are looking for a Full Stack Developer with strong experience in React.js (Frontend) and Spring Boot Microservices (Backend) to join our growing engineering team. The ideal candidate will not only be proficient in building scalable web applications from end to end but should also be able to guide and mentor team members, participate in architectural discussions, and drive technical excellence across the stack.

Key Responsibilities


 * Design, develop, and maintain scalable full-stack applications using React.js and Spring Boot microservices.
 * Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code on both frontend and backend.
 * Design and implement RESTful APIs and microservice communication strategies.
 * Optimize applications for maximum speed, performance, and responsiveness.
 * Ensure best practices in code quality, testing, CI/CD, and deployment.
 * Take ownership of modules and provide architectural guidance and technical direction.
 * Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers in the team.
 * Troubleshoot and debug production issues across services and stacks.
 * Stay up-to-date with modern trends and tools in full-stack development.
   
   

Requirements


 * 5+ years of overall experience in full-stack web development.
 * Strong experience with React.js, including hooks, functional components, and state management (e.g., Redux, Context API).
 * Solid understanding of Spring Boot, Spring Security, and Microservices architecture.
 * Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and API security best practices.
 * Hands-on experience with relational databases (MySQL).
 * Familiarity with Docker, CI/CD pipelines, Git, and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
 * Strong problem-solving skills, architectural thinking, and debugging capabilities.
 * Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies.
 * Ability to guide and mentor team members and contribute to team knowledge sharing.
   
   

Education


 * BE / B.Tech. in Computer Science or IT with 1st class
